listener.description: Extend the model to add a join to the session table
Display user online information within postbit

option.edit_format_params: 1 = Above Avatar 2 = Below Avatar 3 = Above Username 4 = Below User Title 5 = Above User Extra Info 6 = Below User Extra Info

phrases.phrase: Controls the location of the Online Display
Enable / disable adding online, offline, invisible indicator to message user block.
Enable / disable adding admin user links from message user info block username.

Change registration dropdown to popup overlay.
Ensure: Style Properties > Overlays & Tooltips > Enable Overlays is enabled.
Strip poll from create thread to button option. Click button to show poll options.
URL path excluding base forum href.
Enable / disable adding a profile support message to admin and staff profiles to stop posting of help questions upon profiles.
Enables automatic checking of the "remember me" login checkbox.
Enables / disables all user ribbons on message user info block.
Enable / disable adding staff online into members online sidebar block.
Enable / disable to shift visitor links to a custom userbar / moderator bar.
Please do not ask for forum help at this profile. Profile comments are for personal short messages, not forum help. All forum help questions can be asked at the

property.title: Add User Admin Links
property.description: Enable / disable adding admin user links from message user info block username.

property.title: Change Staff Online Location
property.description: Enable / disable adding staff online into members online sidebar block.

property.title: Online Status Indicator
property.description: Enable / disable adding online, offline, invisible indicator to message user block.

property.title: Userbar
property.description: Enable / disable to shift visitor links to a custom userbar / moderator bar.

property.title: Poll To Button
property.description: Strip poll from create thread to button option. Click button to show poll options.

property.title: Remember Me
property.description: Enables automatic checking of the "remember me" login checkbox.

property.title: User Ribbons
property.description: Enables / disables all user ribbons on message user info block.

property.title: Profile Support
property.description: Enable / disable adding a profile support message to admin and staff profiles to stop posting of help questions upon profiles.

property.title: URL
property.description: URL path excluding base forum href.

property.title: Overlay Registration / Login
property.description:
Change registration dropdown to popup overlay.
Ensure: Style Properties > Overlays & Tooltips > Enable Overlays is enabled.

templates.template:
• {xen:property xfofRibbonsOneTitle}
  • {xen:property xfofRibbonsTwoTitle}
  • {xen:property xfofRibbonsThreeTitle}
  • {xen:property xfofRibbonsFourTitle}
  • {xen:property xfofRibbonsFiveTitle}

modification.title: hlf001
lb002
modification.replace_value: <xen:if is="{xen:property xfofOverlayRegistration}"> class="OverlayTrigger concealed noOutline" <xen:else /> class="concealed noOutline" </xen:if>

modification.title: lbf001
modification.search_value: <label for="ctrl_remember" class="rememberPassword"><input type="checkbox" name="remember" value="1" id="ctrl_remember" tabindex="103" /> {xen:phrase stay_logged_in}</label>
modification.replace_value:
<xen:if is="{xen:property xfofRememberMe}"> <label for="ctrl_remember" class="rememberPassword"><input type="checkbox" name="remember" value="1" checked="checked" id="ctrl_remember" tabindex="103" /> {xen:phrase stay_logged_in}</label>
<xen:else />
<label for="ctrl_remember" class="rememberPassword"><input type="checkbox" name="remember" value="1" id="ctrl_remember" tabindex="103" /> {xen:phrase stay_logged_in}</label> </xen:if>

modification.description: Shift visitor tabs to moderator bar.

modification.title: mui001

modification.title: mv001
modification.description: Adds profile comment to admin and moderator profiles.

modification.title: nvt002
modification.description: Shift visitor tabs to moderator bar.
modification.search_value: • {xen:phrase log_out}
modification.replace_value:
• {xen:phrase log_out}
  • {xen:phrase log_out}

modification.title: pc001
modification.description: Shift visitor tabs to moderator bar.
modification.replace_value:
<xen:if is="{xen:property xfofUserbar}">
<xen:if is="{$visitor.user_id}"> <xen:include template="moderator_bar" /> <xen:elseif is="!{$visitor.user_id} && !{$hideLoginBar}" /> <xen:include template="login_bar" /> </xen:if>
<xen:else />
<xen:if is="{$visitor.is_moderator} || {$visitor.is_admin}"> <xen:include template="moderator_bar" /> <xen:elseif is="!{$visitor.user_id} && !{$hideLoginBar}" /> <xen:include template="login_bar" /> </xen:if>
</xen:if>

modification.title: pcss001
modification.description: Adds xfof.css into public.css. No requirement to call into templates, just edit hint for viewing.

modification.title: sou001
modification.description: Adds staff online into members online as small avatars.
modification.search_value:
{xen:phrase staff_online_now}

  • {xen:helper userTitle, $user}
    •

{xen:phrase members_online_now}

{xen:phrase people_you_follow}:

    •

{xen:phrase members}:
  1. {$user.username}, {xen:phrase guest},
  2. ... {xen:phrase and_x_more, 'count={xen:number $onlineUsers.recordsUnseen}'}
    3.
{xen:phrase online_now_x_members_y_guests_z, 'total={xen:number $onlineUsers.total}', 'members={xen:number $onlineUsers.members}', 'guests={xen:number $onlineUsers.guests}'}

modification.title: tc001
modification.description: Strip thread poll to poll button option.
modification.replace_value: <xen:include template="attachment_upload_button" /> <xen:if is="{xen:property xfofPollToButton}"><input type="button" value="{xen:phrase post_poll}" class="button DisableOnSubmit JsOnly" id="button_post_poll") /></xen:if>

modification.title: tc002
modification.description: Strip thread poll to poll button option.
modification.replace_value: <xen:hook name="thread_create_fields_extra" params="{xen:array 'forum={$forum}'}" /> <xen:if is="{xen:property xfofPollToButton}"> <div id="post_poll" style="display:none"> </xen:if>

modification.title: tc003
modification.description: Strip thread poll to poll button option.
